1.0.name: wordpress/content-stats
1.0.description:
Content Stats is a very useful plugin that helps you to keep the track of all Posts/Pages views.

You have to drag-drop the Content Stats widget into any of the sidebar in order to display it in the front end.

For Content Stats Tutorial click here http://www.flubers.com/items/inkthemes-content-stats-wordpress-plugin-counts-website-hits/

It contains three tabs that show you data as:

  • First is a current hit tab that shows hits to post /page of the last seven days.

  • Second All time tab that show mostly viewed post/page.

  • Last Just Seen which show recently viewed post/page title. 

You can directly view the status of content stats from your dashboard which maintain all the records in tabular form including its statistics.

Read more instructions about how to use here
